sample.name: tableofcontents
sample.title: Table of Contents Sample
sample.description: Shows how table-of-contents structures could be created for the generated reports.

feature.name: tableofcontents
feature.title: Creating Table-Of-Contents Structures
feature.description: How to create an table of contents type of index with hyperlinks at the beginning of a document.

feature.name: fileresolver
feature.title: File Resolver
feature.description: Shows how to use file resolver implementations in order to locate file resources referenced from within reports using relative paths.

feature.name: csvmetadataexport
feature.title: Exporting to CSV Format Using Report Metadata
feature.description: Shows how to export the report to CSV format using metadata associated with report elements at design time, to mark data columns.
